byline.original: By SUSANNAH L. GRIFFEE and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

abstract: Tell us what you think about the locker-decorating trend described in this article. How do you put your personal stamp on the things you're required to have at school?
snippet: Tell us what you think about the locker-decorating trend described in this article. How do you put your personal stamp on the things you're required to have at school?

headline.main: How Do You Personalize the Things You're Required to Have at School?
